OrderItemRecipient.name: OrderItemRecipient
OrderItemRecipient.description: Represents a site, employee, or other entity for which services are being ordered. This includes essential details such as the recipient's name, contact information, and the specific site or location where the services will be provided.

BroadbandConnectionType.description: The name of the broadband connection that's available at the address.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaxDownloadSpeed.description: The maximum download speed available at the address.

MaxUploadSpeed.description: The maximum upload speed available at the address.

Name.description: The name of the customer's site or location.

OrderId.description: The order associated with the recipient.

RecipientType.description: Specifies the type of recipient of the order.

ServiceAddrValidationDate.description: The date and time when the address was validated.

Service Account.description: Reference to the Account Entity where the product is used, serviced, or installed.

ServiceAddrValidationMsg.description: The message sent after the validation of the address.

ServiceAddrValidationResult.description: Specifies the status of the address validation.

ServiceAddress.description: The address where the recipient receives the order.

ServiceCity.description: The city where the recipient receives the order.

ServiceCountry.description: The country where the recipient receives the order.

ServiceGeocodeAccuracy.description: Specifies the accuracy level of the geocoded address coordinates.

ServiceLatitude.description: The latitude of the location where the recipient receives the order.

ServiceLongitude.description: The longitude of the location where the recipient receives the order.

ServicePostalCode.description: The postal code of the address.

ServiceState.description: The state where the recipient receives the order.

ServiceStreet.description: The street where the recipient receives the order

ServiceabilityCheckDate.description: The date and time when the serviceability check was done.

ServiceabilityData.description: The information about serviciability, such as broadband connection, download, and upload speeds available at the address.
